thread.title: Stonebridge Companies’ Hampton Inn by Hilton Denver West/ Golden Welcomes Packers™ Fans to Denver this November
thread.title_full: Stonebridge Companies’ Hampton Inn by Hilton Denver West/ Golden Welcomes Packers™ Fans to Denver this November

author: Maggie Mistovich
title: Stonebridge Companies’ Hampton Inn by Hilton Denver West/ Golden Welcomes Packers™ Fans to Denver this November
text:
The Denver Broncos™ take on the Green Bay Packers™ at home in Denver, on Sunday, November 1st. From Friday, October 30th to Monday, November 2nd, Hampton Inn by Hilton Denver West/ Golden is offering a special Wisconsin rate- only available to guests who show their Wisconsin Driver’s License. Located 20 minutes west of Sports Authority Field at Mile High, home of the Denver Broncos, the Hampton Inn by Hilton Denver West/ Golden is perfect for football fanatics everywhere. Hampton Inn by Hilton Denver West/ Golden is an ideal destination for a Rocky Mountains getaway or for business travelers looking to enjoy the pleasures of the mountains, but still be close to Downtown. Within close proximity to great Colorado attractions, including Fossil Trace Golf Course, Red Rocks Park and Amphitheater, Colorado Mills Mall, and much more, Hampton Inn by Hilton Denver West/ Golden offers guests amazing amenities, comfortable rooms and affordable room packages. Hotel amenities include free daily hot breakfast, premium movie channels, microwave and mini-refrigerator in room, complimentary high-speed Internet access and so much more. With 121 great rooms, guests have various choices in room type, from king, double queen, king study and accessible rooms available upon request.
For more information or to make reservations, please visit http://www.hamptongolden.com or call (303) 278-6600. The Hampton Inn by Hilton Denver West/ Golden is proudly managed by Stonebridge Companies in Denver, Colo.
Founded in 1991 by Navin C. Dimond, Stonebridge Companies is a privately owned, innovative hotel owner, operator and developer headquartered near Denver. Its diverse listing of properties includes select-service, extended-stay, mid-scale and full-service hotels in markets throughout the U.S. For detailed information, visit http://www.sbcos.com .
